original: ime pañca mahāsupine viya cāti.

original: Tattha yaṃ dhātukkhobhato anubhūtapubbato ca supine passati, na taṃ saccaṃ hoti.

original: saccameva hoti. Etesaṃ catunnaṃ mūlakāraṇānaṃ saṃsaggabhedatopi supinabhedo hotiyeva.

original: Taṃ panetaṃ catubbidhampi supinaṃ sekhaputhujjanāva passanti appahīnavipallāsattā,

original: asekhā na passanti pahīnavipallāsattā. Kiṃ panetaṃ passanto sutto passati paṭibuddho,
analyzed: asekhā na passanti pahīna vipallāsa ttā kim pana etam passanto suttaḥ passati paṭibuddhaḥ

original: udāhu neva sutto na paṭibuddhoti? Kiñcettha yadi tāva sutto passati, abhidhammavirodho
analyzed: udāhu na iva suttaḥ na paṭibuddhaḥ ti kiñca ittha yadi tāva sutto passati abhidhamma virodho

original: āpajjati. Bhavaṅgacittena hi supati, taṃ rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ rāgādisampayuttaṃ
analyzed: āpajjati bhavaṅga cittena hi supati tam rūpa nimitta ādi ārammaṇam rāga ādi sampayuttam

original: vā na hoti. Supinaṃ passantassa ca īdisāni cittāni uppajjanti. Atha paṭibuddho passati,
analyzed: vā na hoti supinam passantassa ca īdisāni cittāni uppajjanti atha paṭibuddhaḥ passati

original: vinayavirodho āpajjati. Yañhi paṭibuddho passati, taṃ sabbohārikacittena passati.
analyzed: vinaya virodhaḥ āpajjati yam hi paṭibuddhaḥ passati tam sabbohārika cittena passati

original: Sabbohārikacittena ca kate vītikkame anāpatti nāma natthi. Supinaṃ passantena pana
analyzed: sabbohārika cittena ca kate vītikkame anāpatti nāma natthi supinam passantena pana

original: katepi vītikkame ekantaṃ anāpatti eva. Atha neva sutto na paṭibuddho passati, na
analyzed: kate api vītikkame ekantam anāpatti eva atha na iva suttaḥ na paṭibuddhaḥ passati na

original: nāma passati. Evañca sati supinassa abhāvo ca āpajjati? Na abhāvo. Kasmā? Yasmā kapimiddhapareto
analyzed: nāma passati evañca sati supinassa abhāvo ca āpajjati na abhāvaḥ kasmā yasmā

original: passati. Vuttañhetaṃ – “kapimiddhapareto kho, mahārāja, supinaṃ passatī”ti.
analyzed: passati vuttam ha etam kapimiddha paretaḥ kho mahā rāja supinam passati iti

original: Kapimiddhaparetoti makkaṭaniddāya yutto. Yathā hi makkaṭassa niddā lahuparivattā
analyzed: makkaṭa niddāya yuttaḥ yathā hi makkaṭassa niddā lahu parivattā

original: hoti, evaṃ yā niddā punappunaṃ kusalādicittavokiṇṇattā lahuparivattā, yassā pavattiyaṃ
analyzed: hoti evam yā niddā punappunam kusala ādi citta vokiṇṇattā lahu parivattā yassā

original: punappunaṃ bhavaṅgato uttaraṇaṃ hoti, tāya yutto supinaṃ passati. Tenāyaṃ supino
analyzed: punappunam bhavaṅgataḥ uttaraṇam hoti tāya yuttaḥ supinam passati tena ayam supinaḥ

original: kusalopi hoti akusalopi abyākatopi. Tattha supinante cetiyavandanadhammassavanadhammadesanādīni
analyzed: kusalaḥ pi hoti akusalaḥ pi abyākataḥ pi tattha cetiya vandana dhamma ssavana dhamma desanā ādīni

original: karontassa kusalo, pāṇātipātādīni karontassa akusalo, dvīhi antehi mutto āvajjanatadārammaṇakkhaṇe
analyzed: karontassa kusalaḥ pāṇātipāta ādīni karontassa akusalaḥ dvīhi antehi muttaḥ āvajjana tad ārammaṇa kkhaṇe

original: abyākatoti veditabbo. Svāyaṃ dubbalavatthukattā cetanāya paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asamattho.
analyzed: abyākataḥ ti veditabbaḥ svāyam dubbala vatthuka ttā cetanāya paṭisandhim ākaḍḍhitum asamatthaḥ

original: Pavatte pana aññehi kusalākusalehi upatthambhito vipākaṃ deti. Kiñcāpi vipākaṃ deti,
analyzed: pavatte pana aññehi kusala akusalehi upatthambhitaḥ vipākam deti kiñca api vipākam deti

original: atha kho avisaye uppannattā abbohārikāva supinantacetanā. So panesa supino kālavasenapi
analyzed: atha kho avisaye uppanna ttā abbohārikā āva supina anta cetanā saḥ pana īsa supinaḥ kāla vasena api

original: divā tāva diṭṭho na sameti, tathā paṭhamayāme majjhimayāme pacchimayāme ca. Balavapaccūse
analyzed: divā tāva diṭṭhaḥ na sameti tathā paṭhama yāme majjhima yāme pacchima yāme ca balava paccūse

original: pana asitapītakhāyite sammā pariṇāmaṃ gate kāyasmiṃ ojāya patiṭṭhitāya aruṇe uggacchamāneva
analyzed: pana asita pīta khāyite sammā pariṇāmam gate kāyasmiṃ ojāya patiṭṭhitāya aruṇe uggacchamānā iva

original: diṭṭho supino sameti. Iṭṭhanimittaṃ supinaṃ passanto iṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhati, aniṭṭhanimittaṃ passanto aniṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: diṭṭhaḥ supinaḥ sameti iṭṭha nimittam supinam passantaḥ iṭṭham paṭilabhati aniṭṭha nimittam passantaḥ aniṭṭham

original: Ime pana pañca mahāsupine neva lokiyamahājano passati, na mahārājāno, na cakkavattirājāno,
analyzed: ime pana pañca mahā supine na iva lokiya mahājanaḥ passati na mahā rājānaḥ na cakkavatti rājāno

original: na aggasāvakā, na paccekabuddhā, na sammāsambuddhā, eko sabbaññubodhisattoyeva passati.
analyzed: na aggasāvakāḥ na paccekabuddhāḥ na sammāsambuddhāḥ ekaḥ sabbaññu bodhisattaḥ yā iva passati

original: Amhākaṃ pana bodhisatto kadā ime supine passīti? “Sve buddho bhavissāmī”ti cātuddasiyaṃ
analyzed: amhākam pana bodhisatto kadā ime supine passi iti sve buddhaḥ bhavissāmi iti cātuddasiyam

original: pakkhassa rattivibhāyanakāle passi. Terasiyantipi vadantiyeva. So ime supine disvā
analyzed: pakkhassa ratti vibhāyana kāle vadantiyā iva saḥ ime supine disvā

original: uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhuñjitvā nisinno cintesi – “sace mayā kapilavatthunagare ime
analyzed: uṭṭhāya pallaṅkam ābhuñjitvā nisinnaḥ cintesi sace mayā kapilavatthu nagare ime

original: supinā diṭṭhā assu, pitu mahārājassa katheyyaṃ. Sace pana me mātā jīveyya, tassā
analyzed: supinā diṭṭhāḥ assu mahā rājassa katheyyam sace pana me mātā jīveyya tassā

original: katheyyaṃ. Imasmiṃ kho pana ṭhāne imesaṃ paṭiggāhako nāma natthi, ahameva paṭigaṇhissāmī”ti.
analyzed: katheyyam imasmim kho pana ṭhāne imesam paṭiggāhakaḥ nāma natthi aham eva paṭigaṇhissāmi iti

original: Tato “idaṃ imassa pubbanimittaṃ idaṃ imassā”ti sayameva supine paṭiggaṇhitvā uruvelagāme
analyzed: tatas idam imassa pubba nimittam idam imassa ati sayam eva supine paṭiggaṇhitvā uruvelagāme

original: sujātāya dinnaṃ pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha bodhiṃ patvā anukkamena
analyzed: sujātāya dinnam pāyāsam paribhuñjitvā bodhimaṇḍam āruyha bodhim patvā anukkamena

original: jetavane viharanto attano makulabuddhakāle diṭṭhe pañca mahāsupine vitthāretuṃ bhikkhū
analyzed: jetavane viharantaḥ attanaḥ makula buddha kāle diṭṭhe pañca mahā supine vitthāretum bhikkhū

original: āmantetvā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
analyzed: āmantetvā imam desanam ārabhi

original: Tattha mahāpathavīti cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūretvā ṭhitā mahāpathavī. Mahāsayanaṃ ahosīti
analyzed: tattha mahā pathavī iti cakkavāḷa gabbham pūretvā ṭhitā mahā pathavī mahā sayanam ahosi iti

original: sirisayanaṃ ahosi. Ohitoti ṭhapito. So pana na udakasmiṃyeva ṭhapito ahosi, atha
analyzed: sirisayanam ahosi ohito ti ṭhapito saḥ pana na udakasmiṃyā iva ṭhapitaḥ ahosi atha

original: kho pācīnasamuddassa uparūparibhāgena gantvā pācīnacakkavāḷamatthake ṭhapito ahosīti
analyzed: kho pācīna samuddassa uparu upari bhāgena gantvā pācīna cakkavāḷa matthake ṭhapitaḥ ahosi iti

original: veditabbo. Pacchime samudde dakkhiṇe samuddeti etesupi eseva nayo. Tiriyā nāma tiṇajātīti
analyzed: veditabbo pacchime samudde dakkhiṇe samudde ti etesu pi esā iva nayaḥ tiriyā nāma tiṇa jātī iti

original: dabbatiṇaṃ vuccati. Nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṃ āhacca ṭhitā ahosīti naṅgalamattena rattadaṇḍena
analyzed: dabbatiṇam vuccati nābhiyā uggantvā nabham āhacca ṭhitā ahosi iti naṅgala mattena ratta daṇḍena

original: nābhito uggantvā passantassa passantasseva vidatthimattaṃ ratanamattaṃ byāmamattaṃ
analyzed: nābhitas uggantvā passantassa passantassa iva vidatthi mattam ratana mattam byāma mattam

original: yaṭṭhimattaṃ gāvutamattaṃ aḍḍhayojanamattaṃ yojanamattanti evaṃ uggantvā uggantvā
analyzed: yaṭṭhi mattam gāvuta mattam aḍḍhayojana mattam yojana mattam iti evam uggantvā uggantvā

original: anekayojanasahassaṃ nabhaṃ āhacca ṭhitā ahosi. Pādehi ussakkitvāti agganakhato paṭṭhāya

original: paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇoti evaṃ nānāvaṇṇā. Setāti paṇḍarā parisuddhā. Mahato mīḷhapabbatassāti
analyzed: paṇḍu palāsa vaṇṇo ti evam nānā vaṇṇā setā ati paṇḍarā parisuddhā mahataḥ mīḷhapabbatassa ati

original: tiyojanubbedhassa gūthapabbatassa. Uparūpari caṅkamatīti matthakamatthake caṅkamati.
analyzed: ti yojana ubbedhassa gūtha pabbatassa upari upari caṅkamati iti matthaka matthake caṅkamati

original: Dīghāyukabuddhā pana tiyojanike mīḷhapabbate anupavisitvā nisinnā viya honti.
analyzed: dīgha āyuka buddhāḥ pana ti yojanike mīḷhapabbate an upavisitvā nisinnāḥ viya honti

original: Evaṃ ettakena ṭhānena pubbanimittāni dassetvā idāni saha pubbanimittehi paṭilābhaṃ
analyzed: evam ettakena ṭhānena pubba nimittāni dassetvā idāni saha pubba nimittehi paṭilābham

original: dassetuṃ yampi, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha sabbaguṇadāyakattā buddhānaṃ arahattamaggo
analyzed: dassetum yam pi bhikkhave ti ādim āha tattha sabba guṇa dāyaka ttā buddhānam arahatta maggaḥ

original: anuttarā sammāsambodhi nāma. Tasmā yaṃ so cakkavāḷamahāpathaviṃ sirisayanabhūtaṃ
analyzed: anuttarā sammāsambodhi nāma tasmai yam saḥ cakkavāḷa mahā pathavim siri sayana bhūtam

original: addasa, taṃ buddhabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ. Yaṃ himavantapabbatarājānaṃ bimbohanaṃ
analyzed: addasa tam buddha bhāvassa pubba nimittam yam himavanta pabbata rājānam bimbohanam

original: addasa, taṃ sabbaññutaññāṇabimbohanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Yaṃ cattāro hatthapāde cakkavāḷamatthake
analyzed: addasa tam sabbaññu taññāṇa bimbohanassa pubba nimittam yam cattāraḥ hattha pāde cakkavāḷa matthake

original: ṭhite addasa, taṃ dhammacakkassa appaṭivattiyabhāve pubbanimittaṃ. Yaṃ attānaṃ uttānakaṃ
analyzed: ṭhite addasa tam dhammacakkassa appaṭivattiya bhāve pubba nimittam yam attānam uttānakam

original: nipannaṃ addasa, taṃ tīsu bhavesu avakujjānaṃ sattānaṃ uttānamukhabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ.
analyzed: nipannam addasa tam tīsu bhavesu avakujjānam sattānam uttāna mukha bhāvassa pubba nimittam

original: Yaṃ akkhīni ummīletvā passanto viya ahosi, taṃ dibbacakkhupaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ.
analyzed: yam akkhīni ummīletvā passantaḥ viya ahosi tam dibba cakkhu paṭilābhassa pubba nimittam

original: Yaṃ yāva bhavaggā ekālokaṃ ahosi, taṃ anāvaraṇañāṇassa pubbanimittaṃ. Sesaṃ pāḷivaseneva veditabbanti.
analyzed: yam yāva bhavaggāḥ ekālokam ahosi tam anāvaraṇa ñāṇassa pubba nimittam sesam pāḷi vasena iva veditabbanti

original: 7. Vassasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: vassa sutta vaṇṇanā

original: Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ – “na kālavassa”nti. Aṭṭhamanavamāni uttānatthāneva.

original: 10. Nissāraṇīyasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: nissāraṇīya sutta vaṇṇanā

original: vīmaṃsanatthaṃ kāmābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ pesentassāti attho. Na pakkhandatīti nappavisati.
analyzed: vīmaṃsana attham kāma abhimukham cittam pesentassa ati atthaḥ na pakkhandati iti na pavisati

original: Nappasīdatīti pasādaṃ nāpajjati. Na santiṭṭhatīti nappatiṭṭhahati. Na vimuccatīti

original: kho panāti idha nekkhammaṃ nāma asubhesu paṭhamajjhānaṃ, tadassa manasikaroto cittaṃ

original: pakkhandati. Tassa taṃ cittanti tassa taṃ asubhajjhānacittaṃ. Sugatanti gocare gatattā
analyzed: pakkhandati tassa tam cittan ti tassa tam asubha jjhāna cittam gocare gata ttā

original: suṭṭhu gataṃ. Subhāvitanti ahānabhāgiyattā suṭṭhu bhāvitaṃ. Suvuṭṭhitanti kāmato

original: so taṃ kāmavedanaṃ vighātapariḷāhavedanañca na vediyati. Idamakkhātaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇanti

original: idaṃ asubhajjhānaṃ kāmehi nissaṭattā kāmānaṃ nissaraṇanti akkhātaṃ. Yo pana taṃ jhānaṃ

analyzed: pādakam katvā saṅkhāre sammasantaḥ tatiya maggam patvā anāgāmi phalena nibbānam disvā

original: “puna kāmā nāma natthī”ti jānāti. Tassa cittaṃ accantanissaraṇameva. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

original: Ananusayāti anibbattiyā. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.

original: 5. Pañcamapaṇṇāsakaṃ
analyzed: pañcama paṇṇāsakam

original: vā kucchitaṃ uddhumātanti uddhumātakaṃ. Vinīlaṃ vuccati viparibhinnavaṇṇaṃ, vinīlameva
analyzed: vā kucchitam uddhumātanti uddhumātakam vinīlam vuccati viparibhinna vaṇṇam vinīlam eva

original: vinīlakaṃ. Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vinīlanti vinīlakaṃ. Maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa
analyzed: vinīlakam vā kucchitam vinīlanti vinīlakam maṃsussada ṭṭhānesu ratta vaṇṇassa

original: pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇassa yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nīlaṭṭhāne nīlasāṭakapārutasseva

original: chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paribhinnaṭṭhānehi navahi vā vaṇamukhehi vissandamānaṃ
analyzed: chava sarīrassa itam adhivacanam paribhinna ṭṭhānehi navahi vā vaṇa mukhehi vissandamānam

original: pubbaṃ vipubbaṃ, vipubbameva vipubbakaṃ. Paṭikūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vipubbanti vipubbakaṃ.
analyzed: pubbam vipubbam vipubbam eva vipubbakam paṭikūla ttā vā kucchitam vipubbanti vipubbakam

original: Vipubbakaṃ jātaṃ tathābhāvaṃ gatanti vipubbakajātaṃ.
analyzed: vipubbakam jātam tathābhāvam gatan ti vipubbaka jātam

original: So imameva kāyanti so bhikkhu imaṃ attano kāyaṃ tena kāyena saddhiṃ ñāṇena upasaṃharati
analyzed: saḥ imam eva kāyan ti saḥ bhikkhu imam attano kāyam tena kāyena saddhim ñāṇena upasaṃharati

original: upaneti. Kathaṃ? Ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatītoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: upaneti katham ayam pi kho kāyaḥ evaṃdhammaḥ evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatītaḥ ti idam vuttam

original: hoti – āyu usmā viññāṇanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ atthitāya ayaṃ kāyo ṭhānagamanādikhamo

original: hoti, imesaṃ pana vigamā ayampi evaṃdhammo evaṃpūtikasabhāvoyevāti. Evaṃbhāvīti evamevaṃ

original: uddhumātādibhedo bhavissati. Evaṃ anatītoti evaṃ uddhumātādibhāvaṃ anatikkanto.
analyzed: uddhumātā ādi bhedaḥ bhavissati evam anatītaḥ ti evam uddhumātā ādi bhāvam an atikkantaḥ

original: Khajjamānanti udarādīsu nisīditvā udaramaṃsaoṭṭhamaṃsaakkhikamaṃsādīni luñcitvā luñcitvā

original: khādiyamānaṃ. Samaṃsalohitanti sesāvasesamaṃsalohitayuttaṃ. Nimmaṃsalohitamakkhitanti

original: maṃse khīṇepi lohitaṃ na sussati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “nimmaṃsalohitamakkhita”nti.

original: Pūtīnīti abbhokāse ṭhitāni vātātapavuṭṭhisamphassena terovassikāneva pūtīni honti,

analyzed: antar bhūmi gatāni pana cirataram tiṭṭhanti cuṇṇaka jātāni iti cuṇṇa vicuṇṇam hutvā vippakiṇṇāni

original: Sabbattha so imamevāti vuttanayena khajjamānādīnaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā. Asmimānasamugghātāyāti

analyzed: gacchati sataḥ iva paṭikkamati iti paṭinivattantaḥ api sati paññāhi samannāgataḥ va nivattati

original: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Satisampajaññāyāti satiyā ca ñāṇassa ca atthāya. Iti imasmiṃ
analyzed: sesa padesu pi esa iva nayaḥ sati sampajaññāya ati satiyā ca ñāṇassa ca atthāya iti imasmin

original: sutte satiñāṇāni missakāni kathitānīti.
analyzed: sutte sati ñāṇāni missakāni kathitāni iti

original: 10. Anuttariyasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: anuttariya sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 30. Dasame uccāvacanti yaṃ kiñci mahantakhuddakaṃ, uccanīcaṃ vā. Hīnanti nihīnaṃ.
analyzed: dasame uccāvacanti yam kiñci mahantakhuddakam uccanīcam vā

original: Gammanti gāmavāsikānaṃ dassanaṃ. Pothujjanikanti puthujjanānaṃ santakaṃ. Anariyanti
analyzed: gammanti gāmavāsikānam dassanam pothujjanikam ti puthujjanānam santakam

original: na ariyaṃ na uttamaṃ na parisuddhaṃ. Anatthasaṃhitanti na atthasannissitaṃ. Na nibbidāyāti
analyzed: na ariyam na uttamam na parisuddham anattha saṃhitanti na attha sannissitam na nibbidāya ati

original: abhiññāyāti na abhijānanatthāya. Na sambodhāyāti na sambodhisaṅkhātassa catumaggañāṇassa

original: Niviṭṭhasaddhoti patiṭṭhitasaddho. Niviṭṭhapemoti patiṭṭhitapemo. Ekantagatoti ekantaṃ

original: anuttaraṃ. Hatthismimpi sikkhatīti hatthinimittaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ hatthisippaṃ sikkhati.

analyzed: sesa padesu pi esā iva nayaḥ uccāvacanti mahantakhuddakam sippam sikkhati

original: Upaṭṭhitā pāricariyeti pāricariyāya paccupaṭṭhitā. Bhāvayanti anussatinti anuttaraṃ

analyzed: anussatim bhāventi viveka paṭisaṃyuttanti nibbāna nissitam katvā khemanti nirupaddavam

original: Amatagāminanti nibbānagāminaṃ, ariyamaggaṃ bhāventīti attho. Appamāde pamoditāti

analyzed: aparihāna sutta dvaya vaṇṇanā

original: 32-33. Dutiye satthugāravatāti satthari garubhāvo. Dhammagāravatāti navavidhe lokuttaradhamme
analyzed: dutiye satthu gāravatā ati satthari garu bhāvaḥ dhamma gāravatā ati navavidhe lokuttara dhamme

original: Appamādagāravatāti appamāde garubhāvo. Paṭisanthāragāravatāti dhammāmisavasena duvidhe
analyzed: appamāda gārava tā ati appamāde garu bhāvo paṭisanthāra gārava tā ati dhamma āmisa vasena duvidhe

original: paṭisanthāre garubhāvo. Satthā garu assāti satthugaru. Dhammo garu assāti dhammagaru.

original: Tibbagāravoti bahalagāravo. Paṭisanthāre gāravo assāti paṭisanthāragāravo. Tatiye

original: manāpajātiyaṃ āgataṃ disvā “kuto bhavaṃ āgato, cirassaṃ bhavaṃ āgato, kathaṃ te idhāgamanamaggo

original: ñāto, kiṃ maggamūḷhosī”tiādīni vadanti. Ayaṃ pana āgatapubbattāyeva evamāha. Thero
analyzed: ñātaḥ kim magga mūḷhaḥ si iti ādīni vadanti ayam pana āgata pubbattāya iva evam āha thero

original: hi kālena kālaṃ brahmalokaṃ gacchatiyeva. Tattha pariyāyamakāsīti vāraṃ akāsi. Yadidaṃ

original: Tato tesaṃ upaṭṭhākā vivadanti, atha manussānaṃ ārakkhadevatā dve koṭṭhāsā honti.

original: Tato ārakkhadevatānaṃ mittā bhummadevatā bhijjanti. Evaṃ paramparāya yāva brahmalokā

original: ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe devamanussā dve koṭṭhāsā honti. Dhammavādīhi pana adhammavādinova

original: bahutarā honti. Tato yaṃ bahukehi gahitaṃ, taṃ gacchanti. Dhammaṃ vissajjetvā bahutarāva

original: adhammaṃ gaṇhanti. Te adhammaṃ purakkhatvā viharantā apāye nibbattanti. Evaṃ dvinnaṃ

original: bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya hoti. Ajjhattaṃ vāti tumhākaṃ abbhantaraparisāya.
analyzed: bhikkhūnam vivādaḥ deva manussānam ahitāya dukkhāya hoti ajjhattam vāti tumhākam abbhantara parisāya

original: Bahiddhāti paresaṃ parisāya.
analyzed: bahiddhā ati paresam parisāya

original: Makkhīti paresaṃ guṇamakkhanalakkhaṇena makkhena samannāgato. Paḷāsīti yugaggāhalakkhaṇena
analyzed: makkhī iti paresam guṇa makkhana lakkhaṇena makkhena samannāgataḥ paḷāsī iti yuga ggāha lakkhaṇena

analyzed: ekatas saṅgaṇhantā api ekassa maṅgale vā roge vā aññasmin vā pana tādise sukha dukkhe

original: uppanne sabbe tattha sahāyabhāvaṃ gacchantāpi samaggā vajjikaraṇīyāni karonti nāma.
analyzed: uppanne sabbe tattha sahāya bhāvam gacchantā api samaggāḥ vajjikaraṇīyāni karonti nāma

original: Evaṃ rājūnaṃ vuddhi hoti.

46. Tatiye sabbepi rāgādayo anuḍahanaṭṭhena aggī. Āhuneyyaggītiādīsu panettha āhunaṃ

original: ca parisukkhaparitintānaṃ bandhanānaṃ dubbalabhāvo viya vipassanāñāṇapītipāmojjehi
analyzed: ca parisukkha paritintānam bandhanānam dubbala bhāvaḥ viya vipassanā ñāṇa pīti pāmojjehi

original: saṃyojanānaṃ bhiyyosomattāya dubbalabhāvo, pāvussakamegho viya arahattamaggañāṇaṃ,
analyzed: saṃyojanānam bhiyyosomattāya dubbala bhāvaḥ pāvussaka meghaḥ viya arahatta magga ñāṇam

original: meghavuṭṭhiudakena nāvāya antopūtibhāvo viya āraddhavipassakassa rūpasattakādivasena
analyzed: megha vuṭṭhi udakena nāvāya antopūti bhāvaḥ āraddha vipassakassa rūpa sattaka ādi vasena

original: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa okkhāyamāne pakkhāyamāne kammaṭṭhāne ekadivasaṃ utusappāyādīni
analyzed: vipassanam vaḍḍhentassa okkhāyamāne pakkhāyamāne kammaṭṭhāne eka divasam utusappāya ādīni

original: laddhā ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa arahattaphalādhigamo. Pūtibandhanāya nāvāya kiñci
analyzed: laddhā eka pallaṅkena nisinnassa arahatta phala adhigamo pūtibandhanāya nāvāya kiñci

original: kālaṃ ṭhānaṃ viya khīṇasaṃyojanassa arahato mahājanaṃ anuggaṇhantassa yāvatāyukaṃ
analyzed: kālam ṭhānam viya khīṇa saṃyojanassa arahataḥ mahājanam anuggaṇhantassa yāvatāyukam

original: ṭhānaṃ, pūtibandhanāya nāvāya anupubbena bhijjitvā apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamo viya khīṇāsavassa
analyzed: ṭhānam pūti bandhanāya nāvāya anupubbena bhijjitvā apaṇṇattika bhāva upagamaḥ viya khīṇāsavassa

original: upādinnakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa apaṇṇattikabhāvūpagamoti
analyzed: upādinna kkhandha bhedena an upādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa apaṇṇattika bhāva upagamaḥ ti

original: imāya upamāya saṃyojanānaṃ dubbalatā dīpitā.
analyzed: upamāya dubbala tā dīpitā

original: 8. Aggikkhandhopamasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: aggi khandhopama sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 72. Aṭṭhamaṃ atthuppattiyaṃ kathitaṃ. Atthuppatti panassa heṭṭhā cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttavaṇṇanāya
analyzed: aṭṭhamam atthuppattiyam kathitam atthuppatti panassa heṭṭhā cūḷaccharā saṅghāta sutta vaṇṇanāya

original: vitthāritā eva. Passatha noti passatha nu. Āliṅgitvāti upagūhitvā. Upanisīdeyyāti
analyzed: vitthāritāḥ eva passatha no ti passatha nu āliṅgitvā ati upagūhitvā upanisīdeyya ati

original: samīpe nissāya nisīdeyya. Upanipajjeyyāti upagantvā nipajjeyya. Ārocayāmīti ācikkhāmi.
analyzed: samīpe nissāya nisīdeyya upanipajjeyya ati upagantvā nipajjeyya ārocayāmi iti ācikkhāmi

original: Paṭivedayāmīti paṭivedetvā jānāpetvā kathemi. Vālarajjuyāti assavālagovālehi vaṭṭitarajjuyā.
analyzed: paṭivedayāmi iti paṭivedetvā jānāpetvā kathemi vāla rajjuyā ati assa vāla govālehi vaṭṭita rajjuyā

original: Paccorasminti uramajjhe. Pheṇuddehakanti pheṇaṃ uddehitvā, ussādetvāti attho. Attatthanti
analyzed: pacca urasmin ti ura majjhe pheṇuddehakam ti pheṇam uddehitvā ussādetvā iti attho attattham iti

original: attano diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikalokiyalokuttaraṃ atthaṃ. Paratthobhayatthesupi eseva
analyzed: attanaḥ diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika lokiya lokuttaram attham parattha ubhayatthesu pi esa eva

original: nayo. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttassa atthuppattiyaṃ
analyzed: nayo sesam ettha yat vattabbam siyā tat sabbam cūḷaccharā saṅghāta suttassa attha uppattiyam

original: kathitameva. Idañca pana suttaṃ kathetvā satthā cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttaṃ kathesi.
analyzed: kathitam eva idam ca pana suttam kathetvā satthā cūḷaccharā saṅghāta suttam kathesi

original: Navamaṃ uttānatthameva.
analyzed: navamam uttānattham eva

original: 10. Arakasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: araka sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 74. Dasame parittanti appaṃ thokaṃ. Tañhi sarasaparittatāyapi khaṇaparittatāyapi
analyzed: dasame appam thokam tat hi sarasa paritta tāya api khaṇa paritta tāya api

original: ṭhitiparittatāyapi parittameva. Lahuṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanato lahukaṃ. Mantāyaṃ boddhabbanti
analyzed: ṭhiti paritta tāya api parittam eva lahum uppajjitvā nirujjhanataḥ lahukam mantā ayam boddhabbanti

original: mantāya boddhabbaṃ, paññāya jānitabbanti attho. Pabbateyyāti pabbatasambhavā. Hārahārinīti
analyzed: mantāya boddhabbam paññāya jānitabbanti attho pabbateyyā ati pabbata sambhavā hāra hārinī iti

original: rukkhanaḷaveḷuādīni haritabbāni harituṃ samatthā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
analyzed: rukkha naḷa veḷu ādīni haritabbāni haritum samatthā sesam sabbattha uttāna attham eva ati

original: Mahāvaggo sattamo.
analyzed: mahāvaggaḥ sattamaḥ

original: 8. Vinayavaggo
analyzed: vinaya vaggo

original: 1. Paṭhamavinayadharasuttavaṇṇanā
75. Aṭṭhamassa paṭhame āpattiṃ jānātīti āpattiṃyeva āpattīti jānāti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: aṭṭhamassa paṭhame āpattim jānāti iti āpattiṃ yeva āpatti iti jānāti sesa padesu pi esa iva nayo

original: 2. Dutiyavinayadharasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: dutiya vinayadhara sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 76. Dutiye svāgatānīti suāgatāni suppaguṇāni. Suvibhattānīti koṭṭhāsato suṭṭhu vibhattāni.
analyzed: dutiye svāgatāni iti su āgatāni suppaguṇāni suvibhattāni iti koṭṭhāsato suṭṭhu vibhattāni

original: Suppavattīnīti āvajjitāvajjitaṭṭhāne suṭṭhu pavattāni daḷhappaguṇāni. Suvinicchitānīti
analyzed: suppavattīni iti āvajjita āvajjita ṭṭhāne suṭṭhu pavattāni daḷha ppaguṇāni su vinicchitāni iti

original: suṭṭhu vinicchitāni. Suttasoti vibhaṅgato. Anubyañjanasoti khandhakaparivārato.
analyzed: suṭṭhu vinicchitāni sutta soti vibhaṅgataḥ anubyañjana soti khandhaka parivārato

original: 3. Tatiyavinayadharasuttavaṇṇanā
77. Tatiye vinaye kho pana ṭhito hotīti vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito hoti. Asaṃhīroti na sakkā hoti gahitaggahaṇaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ.
analyzed: tatiye vinaye kho pana ṭhitaḥ hoti iti vinaya lakkhaṇe patiṭṭhitaḥ hoti asaṃhīro ti na sakkā hoti gahita gahaṇam vissajjāpetum

original: 9. Satthusāsanasuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: satthu sāsana sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 83. Navame ekoti adutiyo. Vūpakaṭṭhoti kāyena gaṇato, cittena kilesehi vūpakaṭṭho
analyzed: navame ekaḥ ti adutiyaḥ vūpakaṭṭho ti kāyena gaṇataḥ cittena kilesehi vūpakaṭṭhaḥ

original: vivekaṭṭho dūrībhūto. Appamattoti satiavippavāse ṭhito. Pahitattoti pesitatto. Nibbidāyāti
analyzed: viveka ṭṭhaḥ dūrībhūtaḥ appamatto ti sati avippavāse ṭhito pahitatto ti pesitatto nibbidāya ati

original: vaṭṭe ukkaṇṭhanatthāya. Virāgāyāti rāgādīnaṃ virajjanatthāya. Nirodhāyāti appavattikaraṇatthāya.
analyzed: vaṭṭe ukkaṇṭhana tthāya virāgāya ati rāga ādīnam virajjana tthāya nirodhāya ati appavatti karaṇa tthāya

original: Vūpasamāyāti kilesavūpasamāya appavattiyā. Abhiññāyāti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā abhijānanatthāya.
analyzed: vūpasamāya ati kilesa vūpasamāya appavattiyā abhiññāya ati ti lakkhaṇam āropetvā abhijānana tthāya

original: Sambodhāyāti maggasaṅkhātassa sambodhassa atthāya. Nibbānāyāti nibbānassa sacchikaraṇatthāya.
analyzed: sambodhāya ati magga saṅkhātassa sambodhassa atthāya nibbānāya ati nibbānassa sacchikaraṇa tthāya

original: 10. Adhikaraṇasamathasuttavaṇṇanā
84. Dasame adhikaraṇāni samenti vūpasamentīti adhikaraṇasamathā. Uppannuppannānanti
analyzed: dasame adhikaraṇāni samenti vūpasamenti iti adhikaraṇa samathāḥ uppanna uppannānanti

original: uppannānaṃ uppannānaṃ. Adhikaraṇānanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: uppannānam uppannānam adhikaraṇānanti vivāda adhikaraṇam anuvāda adhikaraṇam āpatta adhikaraṇam

original: kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ. Samathāya vūpasamāyāti samathatthañceva vūpasamanatthañca.
analyzed: imesam catunnam samathāya vūpasamāyāti samatha attham ca iva vūpasamana ttham ca

original: Sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārakoti ime satta samathā dātabbā. Tesaṃ vinicchayo
analyzed: sammukhā vinayaḥ dātabbā upe ti ime satta samathāḥ dātabbā tesam vinicchayo

original: vinayasaṃvaṇṇanato gahetabbo. Apica dīghanikāye saṅgītisuttavaṇṇanāyampi vitthāritoyeva,
analyzed: vinaya saṃvaṇṇanataḥ gahetabbaḥ apica dīgha nikāye saṅgīti sutta vaṇṇanāyam pi vitthāritaḥ yā eva

original: tathā majjhimanikāye sāmagāmasuttavaṇṇanāyāti.
analyzed: tathā majjhima nikāye sāma gāma sutta vaṇṇanāya ati

original: Vinayavaggo aṭṭhamo.
analyzed: vinaya vaggo aṭṭhamo

original: Ito parāni satta suttāni uttānatthāneva. Na hettha kiñci heṭṭhā avuttanayaṃ nāma atthīti.
analyzed: itas parāni satta suttāni na ha ittha kiñci heṭṭhā a vutta nayam nāma atthi iti

original: Manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttaranikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: manoratha pūraṇiyā aṅguttara nikāya aṭṭhakathāya

original: Sattakanipātassa saṃvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sattaka nipātassa saṃvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā
